version: "3.9"
   
services:
  db:        # First container
    image: postgres
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER=postgres
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres
  app:       # Second container
    build: .

      - app_volume:/code
    ports:

      - DEBUG=1

      - db

volumes:
